data.text: Hey, Tama-chan. What do you plan on doing if I let you through?
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: 󠁿Hey, Tama-chan. What do you plan on doing if I let you through?

data.text: Well I'm worried about you three, so I was gonna offer to help…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿Well I'm worried about you three, so I was gonna offer to help…

data.text:
More importantly… You wouldn't happen to be planning on mediating 
the conversations between those two, now would you?
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
󠁿More importantly… You wouldn't happen to be planning on mediating 
󠁿the conversations between those two, now would you?

data.text: Eh? How the hell'd you…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿Eh? How the hell'd you…

data.text:
Hehe, you really are quite a nice child, Tama-chan. You're a 
child that would act quickly for anyone's sake. However…
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
󠁿Hehe, you really are quite a nice child, Tama-chan. You're a 
󠁿child that would act quickly for anyone's sake. However…

data.text:
It'd be like makin' a child who hasn't learned math yet keep 
track of their family's finances. No one'd do somethin' so cruel. 
Sometimes you just need the right people for the job, doncha think?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿It'd be like makin' a child who hasn't learned math yet keep 
󠁿track of their family's finances. No one'd do somethin' so cruel. 
󠁿Sometimes you just need the right people for the job, doncha think?

data.text: Ahh, no worries! I'll take care of it, so just leave it there.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿Ahh, no worries! I'll take care of it, so just leave it there.

data.text: Why don't we wait here for a bit…?
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: 󠁿Why don't we wait here for a bit…?

data.text: Wait!?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿Wait!?

data.text:
It's not that I'm telling you to stay completely 
out of these kinds of things. However, you also 
shouldn't just do the things for them.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
󠁿It's not that I'm telling you to stay completely 
󠁿out of these kinds of things. However, you also 
󠁿shouldn't just do the things for them.

data.text:
Just give them a little bit of support… then wait. Don't tell 
them that they can't do something. Tell them that they'll soon 
be able to do it with a little bit of help.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
󠁿Just give them a little bit of support… then wait. Don't tell 
󠁿them that they can't do something. Tell them that they'll soon 
󠁿be able to do it with a little bit of help.

data.text:
Believe in them and watch over them. Those 
are ways in which you can show you care.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
󠁿Believe in them and watch over them. Those 
󠁿are ways in which you can show you care.

data.text:
Tama-san, I'm so sorry… I should have come with… Creek-san. The 
mystery has been unraveled, therefore we should all reconvene…
data.name: Rob Roy & Bourbon
data.processed:
󠁿Tama-san, I'm so sorry… I should have come with… Creek-san. The 
󠁿mystery has been unraveled, therefore we should all reconvene…

data.text:
Because the truth is… they're all capable 
of doing amazing things.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
󠁿Because the truth is… they're all capable 
󠁿of doing amazing things.

data.text: Haa… I'm so glad that we were able to make it out of there…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: 󠁿Haa… I'm so glad that we were able to make it out of there…

data.text:
Um, Rice-san… Were you able to speak with Bourbon-san at all…? 
Like when we were trapped inside of that haunted house…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Um, Rice-san… Were you able to speak with Bourbon-san at all…? 
󠁿Like when we were trapped inside of that haunted house…

data.text: Eh? In the haunted house? Umm, while we were trapped…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: 󠁿Eh? In the haunted house? Umm, while we were trapped…

data.text: (Clunkaclunk!!)
data.processed: 󠁿(Clunkaclunk!!)

data.text: Hyaa!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: 󠁿Hyaa!

data.text:
Rice-san, your reactions are quite telling… They 
are truly beneficial when determining how one 
should act in these types of situations.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
󠁿Rice-san, your reactions are quite telling… They 
󠁿are truly beneficial when determining how one 
󠁿should act in these types of situations.

data.text: Eh… I… guess so?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: 󠁿Eh… I… guess so?

data.text:
In the end, Bourbon-san did most of the unravelling while all I 
did was continuously get scared…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
󠁿In the end, Bourbon-san did most of the unravelling while all I 
󠁿did was continuously get scared…

data.text:
But I'm glad… Despite always bothering her, today 
I was at least of some use to Bourbon-san.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
󠁿But I'm glad… Despite always bothering her, today 
󠁿I was at least of some use to Bourbon-san.

data.text:
But all of this wouldn't have happened if you 
didn't invite me here, Rob Roy-san. Ehehe… 
Thank you so much for bringing me here.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
󠁿But all of this wouldn't have happened if you 
󠁿didn't invite me here, Rob Roy-san. Ehehe… 
󠁿Thank you so much for bringing me here.

data.text: I'm so glad… So glad that I was able to help you, Rice-san…!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: 󠁿I'm so glad… So glad that I was able to help you, Rice-san…!

data.text: Huh? Rob Roy-san…?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: 󠁿Huh? Rob Roy-san…?

data.text:
When I invited you, and even after we arrived, I kept doubting 
whether this was a good idea… I kept worrying that I might be 
bothering the two of you…!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿When I invited you, and even after we arrived, I kept doubting 
󠁿whether this was a good idea… I kept worrying that I might be 
󠁿bothering the two of you…!

data.text:
? I-I didn't think of you as a bother? Actually, 
I thought you were really amazing today…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
󠁿? I-I didn't think of you as a bother? Actually, 
󠁿I thought you were really amazing today…

data.text:
That's all thanks to Sweep-san. I actually 
borrowed this wand from her…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿That's all thanks to Sweep-san. I actually 
󠁿borrowed this wand from her…

data.text:
I wanted to be able to express myself just like Sweep-san does. 
That's why… I created a witch persona.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿I wanted to be able to express myself just like Sweep-san does. 
󠁿That's why… I created a witch persona.

data.text: Persona…?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: 󠁿Persona…?

data.text:
Experiencing one's suppressed desires… Becoming someone different 
from oneself… I think that is the true purpose of Halloween, to 
achieve these desires through a transformation.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Experiencing one's suppressed desires… Becoming someone different 
󠁿from oneself… I think that is the true purpose of Halloween, to 
󠁿achieve these desires through a transformation.

data.text:
Could it be… this entire time… behind that 
witch persona… you were really scared?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
󠁿Could it be… this entire time… behind that 
󠁿witch persona… you were really scared?

data.text:
Ehehe… Yes, but I thought you were in trouble so I wanted to 
help. I know it was kind of a selfish thing to do though…!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Ehehe… Yes, but I thought you were in trouble so I wanted to 
󠁿help. I know it was kind of a selfish thing to do though…!

data.text: Rice-chan, Rob Roy-chan. It's time for us to go to the next area.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: 󠁿Rice-chan, Rob Roy-chan. It's time for us to go to the next area.

data.text: ! Ah, okay…! U-Umm… but there's one thing that I'd like to say…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: 󠁿! Ah, okay…! U-Umm… but there's one thing that I'd like to say…

data.text:
Rice-san… you've been worrying about annoying others, 
but to me that just shows how caring you are. 
I just wanted to let you know that…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
󠁿Rice-san… you've been worrying about annoying others, 
󠁿but to me that just shows how caring you are. 
󠁿I just wanted to let you know that…

data.text:
Rob Roy-san… 
…………………
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
󠁿Rob Roy-san… 
󠁿…………………
